ingredients.ingredient: 1 Dietz & Watson Natural Casing NY Style Beef Frank
2 tablespoons processed cheese spread (such as Kraft® Cheez Whiz®)

cookingTips: Warm the pretzel roll to enhance texture and prevent sogginess
Apply Cheez Whiz while the hot dog is still warm for proper melting
